description:
While Kenshiro comes to a bridge checkpoint and finishes off Balda`s squad with the "North Star Toric Murderous Kick Attack!", Raoh continues to advance his main troops forward.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Juza of the Clouds Resurrects! I Have No Fear for Raoh!!
Le retour de Jûza des nuages
よみがえった雲のジュウザ! 俺はラオウを恐れない!!
